text: @marklevinshow Dear dumbass, the medication was originally made for malaria which is what he used it for then. He couldn't use it for Covid-19 because IT DIDN'T FUCKING EXOST UNTIL LAST YEAR YOU IDIOT! Now go over there with the coloring books because those are more your speed.
